attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My name is Angela English and i have been going to my doctors for 16 months with a number of symtoms eg 
Hard tummy
Bloatness
Tummy Pains
Bleading from the back passage
Vomiting
and because i was only 32 i was never tested for bowel cancer  all because they thought i would be too young for it and i have also found out they dont start testing for bowel cancer until your 60 well i think where the word cancer is involed there should be no age limit if your showing the signs you should be tested becuse it may  not then be be too late
